mapper.select: SELECT category_id categoryid,nm FROM sbj_category WHERE TYPE = 1
select DISTINCT A.subject_id subjectid ,A.nm ,A.category_id categoryid FROM subject A INNER JOIN sbj_category B ON A.category_id = B.category_id WHERE B.`type` =1 and A.category_id = #{categoryid};

SELECT DISTINCT B.subject_id subjectid,A.nm,C.user_id userid FROM sbj_category A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.category_id = B.category_id INNER JOIN tc_sbj C ON B.subject_id = C.subject_id INNER JOIN user D ON C.user_id = D.user_id WHERE A.`type`= 1 AND C.user_id = #{userid} and D.apr_yn = 1 group BY A.nm

SELECT DISTINCT A.subject_id subjectid,A.nm,B.user_id userid FROM subject A INNER JOIN tc_sbj B ON A.subject_id= B.subject_id INNER JOIN user C ON B.user_id = C.user_id inner JOIN sbj_category sc on A.category_id = sc.category_id WHERE B.user_id = #{userid} and C.apr_yn = 1

SELECT COUNT(C.class_id) classid FROM van A INNER JOIN school B ON A.school_id = B.school_id INNER JOIN user C ON A.class_id = C.class_id WHERE C.class_id = #{classid} AND C.role ="ROLE_STD" AND C.apr_yn = 1
SELECT COUNT(B.nm) * 14 nm FROM van A INNER JOIN school B ON A.school_id = B.school_id INNER JOIN user C ON A.class_id = C.class_id WHERE A.grade = #{grade} AND C.role ="ROLE_STD" AND C.apr_yn = 1
SELECT DISTINCT B.category_id categoryid,B.nm from subject A INNER JOIN sbj_category B ON A.category_id = B.category_id WHERE B.`type` = 2

SELECT B.nm, rating, COUNT(rating) ratio FROM mock_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id INNER JOIN user D ON A.user_id = D.user_id WHERE D.class_id = #{classId} and B.category_id = #{categoryId} and A.year = year(NOW()) and mon = 6 GROUP BY B.nm, rating;

SELECT SUM(cnt_rating) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(rating) AS cnt_rating FROM mock_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C ON B.category_id = c.category_id INNER JOIN user D ON A.user_id = D.user_id WHERE D.class_id = #{classId} AND B.category_id = 2 AND A.year = YEAR(NOW()) AND mon = 6 GROUP BY B.nm, rating ) AS derived_table;

SELECT B.category_id categoryId, A.subject_id subjectId,A.score,A.rating,A.class_rank classRank ,A.whole_rank wholeRank, A.semester,A.mid_final midfinal FROM aca_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id WHERE result_id = #{resultId}

SELECT B.category_id categoryId , A.subject_id subjectId,A.standard_score standardScore,A.rating,A.percent,A.mon FROM mock_result A INNER join subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id WHERE result_id = #{resultId};
